title: Tabby Compensation Structure
content: Tabby offers competitive compensation packages to attract and retain top feline talent. Full-time employees receive a base salary determined by role, experience, and market rates, with annual performance-based increases. Our bonus structure includes quarterly targets based on company and individual performance, typically ranging from 5-20% of base salary. Stock options are granted to all full-time employees after one year of service. All employees enjoy additional perks including catnip allowance, subsidized meals at our in-house cafeteria, monthly grooming services, and transportation subsidies. Salary reviews occur annually in February, with adjustments effective April 1st. We also offer a competitive 401(k) matching program and profit sharing for eligible employees.
